verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I stand before You, awed by Your
majesty
Covered by Your mercy, Your blood has made me
free

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Draw me to
You, and set my heart on
fire
I want to
know You. You're my one
desire

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
I give You my
worship, all of my
passion
I give You my
whole heart, all my
devotion

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Grace never ending, Your hands that carry
me
Your body it was broken for all the world to
see

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
My heart is
held by love so
unconditional
You
captivate me. You're the lover of my
soul

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Here I will
bow down and say that I
need You
Here I will
worship, say that I
love You

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Oh how I
love You! Oh how I
love You!

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
I want to know You. Let your Spirit overwhelm me.
Let Your
presence overtake my
heart | 2x
